verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> [was] a youth <S%H5288><s%> I loved <S%H157><s%> him, And out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> My son. <S%H1121><s%>

The more they called <S%H7121><s%> them, The more <S%H3651><s%> they went <S%H1980><s%> from them; They kept sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> to the Baals <S%H1168><s%> And burning <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> to idols. <S%H6456><s%>

Yet it is I who taught <S%H7270><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to walk, <S%H7270><s%> I took <S%H3947><s%> them in My arms; <S%H2220><s%> But they did not know <S%H3045><s%> that I healed <S%H7495><s%> them.

I led <S%H4900><s%> them with cords <S%H9112><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> with bonds <S%H5688><s%> of love, <S%H160><s%> And I became <S%H1961><s%> to them as one who lifts <S%H7311><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> from their jaws; <S%H3895><s%> And I bent <S%H5186><s%> down <S%H5186><s%> [and] fed <S%H398><s%> them.

They will not return <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> But Assyria <S%H804><s%> â€“ he will be their king, <S%H4428><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> they refused <S%H3985><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> [to Me.]

And the sword <S%H2719><s%> will whirl <S%H9123><s%> against their cities, <S%H5892><s%> And will demolish <S%H3615><s%> their gate bars <S%H905><s%> And consume <S%H3615><s%> [them] because <S%H4480><s%> of their counsels. <S%H4156><s%>

So My people <S%H5971><s%> are bent <S%H8511><s%> on turning <S%H4878><s%> from Me. Though they call <S%H7121><s%> them to [the One] on high, <S%H5920><s%> None <S%H3808><s%> at all <S%H3162><s%> exalts <S%H7311><s%> [Him.]

How <S%H349><s%> can I give <S%H5414><s%> you up, O Ephraim <S%H669><s%>? How can I surrender <S%H4042><s%> you, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>? How <S%H349><s%> can I make <S%H5414><s%> you like Admah <S%H126><s%>? How can I treat <S%H7760><s%> you like Zeboiim <S%H6636><s%>? My heart <S%H3820><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> over <S%H2015><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> Me, All <S%H3162><s%> My compassions <S%H5150><s%> are kindled. <S%H3648><s%>

I will not execute <S%H6213><s%> My fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger; <S%H639><s%> I will not destroy <S%H7843><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%> For I am God <S%H410><s%> and not man, <S%H376><s%> the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> in your midst, <S%H7130><s%> And I will not come <S%H935><s%> in wrath. <S%H9409><s%>

They will walk <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> He will roar <S%H7580><s%> like a lion; <S%H9030><s%> Indeed <S%H3588><s%> He will roar, <S%H7580><s%> And [His] sons <S%H1121><s%> will come <S%H2729><s%> trembling <S%H2729><s%> from the west. <S%H3220><s%>

They will come <S%H2729><s%> trembling <S%H2729><s%> like birds <S%H6833><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> And like doves <S%H3123><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria; <S%H804><s%> And I will settle <S%H3427><s%> them in their houses, <S%H1004><s%> declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> surrounds <S%H5437><s%> Me with lies, <S%H3585><s%> And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with deceit; <S%H4820><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> is also <S%H5750><s%> unruly <S%H7300><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> Even against <S%H5973><s%> the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> who is faithful. <S%H539><s%>
